epd_metadata.owner_address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.epd_produced_by_address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
epd_metadata.epd_process_certified_by_address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.product_use: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, and water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives, placed on building site or prefabricated, compacted and hardened by hydration of cement.

product_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
product_classes.special_class: Supplied to major construction projects including high rise buildings, dams, spillways, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure; includes high-strength, high-durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: All states of Australia or national as applicable
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: Data updated within 10 years as required
data_quality.quality_assessment: Good or very good for all data sources

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Raw material extraction, transport, manufacturing, and electricity generation
system_boundaries.core_processes: External and internal transport, concrete manufacturing excluding mixing in truck, waste and wastewater treatment
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Distribution, installation, construction waste, deconstruction, waste transport and treatment
system_boundaries.other_lifecycle_stages_excluded: Material emissions from usage, maintenance, repair, replacement, refurbishment, operational energy and water use

installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation site work and forms

assumptions.deconstruction_method: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete during use stage onward, offsetting some cement manufacturing emissions

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data: AusLCI LCA database conforming to EN 15804 allocation rules
recycled_materials_handling.recycled_aggregate_use: Waste concrete recycled into aggregate replacing virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
references: Australian Life Cycle Inventory Database Initiative Guidelines (2023)
British Standards Institution BS EN 15804:2012+A2:2019 and BS EN 16757:2017
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
EPD International General Programme Instructions and PCR2019:14 V1.3.4 (2024)
Scientific articles on carbon footprint of Australia's construction sector

contact_information.company_address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
